ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_0: Then when he reached it, a voice called out, 'Musa!
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_1: When he approached it, a voice called out:
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_2: When he came to it, a voice called out: "Moses!
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_3: When he came near the fire he was called, "Moses,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_4: So when he came near the fire, it was announced, “O Moosa!”
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_5: And when he came to it (the fire), he was called by name: "O Musa!"
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_6: So when he came to it, a voice was uttered: O Musa:
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_7: When he came to it, a voice cried, 'Moses,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_8: And when he reached it, he was called by name: O Moses!
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_9: When he came close to it, a voice called out, "Moses,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_10: Then when he was come thereto, he was cried unto. O Musa!
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_11: So when he came to it, he was called, ‘O Moses!
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_12: But when he came to the fire, a voice was heard: "O Moses!
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_13: And when he came to it (the fire), he was called by name: "O Musa (Moses)!
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_14: When he reached it, he was called: 'O Moses,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_15: Then, when he reached it, he was called, “O Moses.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_16: And when he came to it, he was called, "O Moses,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_17: [20:11] And when he reached it — it was a boxthorn — he was called [by name], ‘O Moses!
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_18: (And when he reached it) it was a green tree from which emanated a white fire, (he was called by name: O Moses!)
